ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars RPG
ygData.msgSnippet: Octociz saw what was going on. The maximal leader was about to blow everything. He couldn t let this happen, especially when it would end the life of the one

Octociz saw what was going on. The maximal leader was about to blow 
everything. He couldn't let this happen, especially when it would end 
the life of the one who everyone is saying should be leader. I know 
this is wrong, and it might not even work, but it is for the greater 
good.

Octociz aimed his blasters up at Liono Prime, and fired.
